revised_title: A Review of Books and Papers on the History of the Royal Society in 1988
tldr: This article provides a compilation of books and papers related to the history of the Royal Society, published in 1988. It includes works by Roger Emerson, Michael Hunter, and the Kurti couple, among others. The review highlights significant contributions to the understanding of the Royal Society's role in the development of modern science and its members' achievements.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
